top_comments.comment: For me it's unacceptable on gen 5 to have to choose between 4k 30 and 1080p kinda 60. There are already launched games that prove they can do better.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I cant beleive we cant get 1440p at 60fps with this game on console. SMFH

No no no. You don’t release a current gen game at either 4K 30 FPS or 1080p 60 FPS. That is NOT using the potential of the Ps5 and there’s no excuse for it in 2021. A HUGE missed opportunity for Square Enix because if this game was able to run at both 4K and 60 FPS, it would be one of the best looking and performing games to date on any console.
1080 for 60fps on ps5 and series x is a bit unacceptably

OMFG 1080p lol 😂 


Love playing my games at 4K buttery smooth 60 FPS on the Cloud ⚡️

How is it that this is performing much worse on Ps5 in other video analysis from other channels? Is this another case of DF sugar coating so the cult of Simpstation dont go crazy? (Wouldn't be the first time. DF have said before they have done this because "Fanboys" are insane"

It would be a shame if you are guarding Sony again because of this.

Nice take... and yeah, I usually go with performance, but with this game and all  it's visual creativity I might just have to run quality mode... Also, just a fyi, Sony does have the VRR for the ps5... but apparently they are waiting to do the update to enable it until the new Bravia line of TVs are released in December.  Hopefully Eidos  Montreal will have a patch ready then..
Yeah f this forza 5 out soon :>
For me it's unacceptable on gen 5 to have to choose between 4k 30 and 1080p kinda 60. There are already launched games that prove they can do better.
Paid by Sony, as usual...dont deny. Subtle but true...
